quote_last: , LEAPMAN switched the light off in his office and stepped into the corridor. He closed his door but didn’t lock it. He walked toward the bank of elevators, aware that the only office light still shining was coming from under the chairman’s door.
title: False Impression
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: ? That’s when he came into the store or when he left after the fact?”
title: The Last Precinct
author: Patricia Cornwell
